i'm 5';8" with long limbs. I"m muscular and lean and long. 32DD, natural, 25 inch waist. I'm typically XS in tops. I like my shirts to be body contouring for work- I work as a loader for a trailer company. This top is very soft and has slight compression. It is a warm layering piece. It was too hot for me to wear to work in October. It's perfect for November nights in CT. I am typically XS or Small in tops. I'm Medium in bikini tops. The XS in this top is too tight. I can wear it- but I can feel it compressing my body down. I look like a bit of a packed sausage in it. The Small is comfortable- still tight, but not as much compression. I'm going to order another color in Medium. As a woman, you need several sizes in tops for the hormone swing bloat.

评论概述: Fitted, stretchy, good color, cheap fabric, fits as expected.
评论详情: I will start with a couple of flaws that cost this review two stars. The color block pattern requires careful shaping. With the slim black sleeves and very high neckline, the chest looks much broader than it really is, which is clearly not flattering, the black color from the sleeves should have covered more of shoulders and the collar bones, maybe the neck band should have been broader or sat lower. The fabric is cheap, it might even spark in dry weather.  I like the color, the length of the sleeves, the snug fit (I sized down to wear it to dance classes or as a bottom layer for regular workouts.

评论概述: A very nice form fitting top.
评论详情: I love this trendy form-fitting shirt. It fits almost anything I wear whether it's a sporty outfit with shorts or jeans. I like how it fits snugly without pinching or binding and the fabric is so soft to my skin. This top has extra long sleeves and a very nice round collar that is not too tight on the neckline. You can pick from a huge variety of color combinations. it's one of my favorites.
5’3” 122 lbs. the xsmall is waaaaay too tiny; it rolled up and way too tight for work. Colors exactly as shown and nice material. It is not see through even when stretched

I purchased a large.  This runs very small so if you have a bigger chest area, you are going to want to get a much larger size.  My daughter ended up taking it so it worked out perfect but I could not wear it for myself.

This shirt is stretchy, but its too stretchy for the thick material. It feels odd and shows every little detail. I don't want this type of shirt to fit like a glove. Its not really cropped, so I feel that is misleading. The material is off-putting. But if you want this, order a size up. It felt like a restraint to me and I just couldn't keep it on and be comfortable.

Very cute, just really tight in the chest and a little baggy in the arms. I’m a 34C  5’3” and 121 lbs and I ordered a small. The material feels artificial. I’m going look for something like this in cotton.

评论概述: Good quality, runs a little small
评论详情: I like this shirt a lot.  It is a thicker fabric so it doesn’t look cheap (never know what you’re getting with Amazon clothes).  I feel like it runs a little small.  I’m usually an XS in tops and this is a little tight which wouldn’t be too big of an issue except the bottom rides up a little.  I haven’t worn it yet but will be perfect as a casual top for a cold day since the thicker fabric seems like it would be warm for the winter!

评论概述: You cant go wrong with this purchase!
评论详情: I have purchased 5 tops in this style from Trendy Queen.  I have washed and dried them and they fit the same on me. I love the flattering fit of the top.  The color combinations are great. I have 5 more in my shopping cart as I write this review. Trendy Queen is my new go to for all tops this winter.
Smooth like butter. Runs a bit tight. I’m 5’4” 135 lbs 36D and needed large.

I had almost given up ordering clothes from Amazon because I was disappointed in the quality, fit or sizing nearly every time.  This top totally restored my faith in buying clothes online.  I absolutely love this shirt.  It is super soft, has just the right amount of stretch and fits me like a glove.  I love how it feels and looks.  It is just my style and I will be wearing this one all through the fall and winter.

The color block design is trendy and adds a fun pop to my wardrobe, making it easy to pair with jeans or skirts for a casual yet stylish look. I also appreciate the slightly cropped length, which gives it a modern vibe that’s perfect for layering or wearing on its own.

A lot of color options with this super comfortable top. It is form fitting and I tend to focus on my flaws- bra area rolls do show a bit. But not so much that it will keep me from wearing it. I’m 145lbs 5’7” and I went with a medium. I’m typically a medium with 34c.  If i sized down it would be too firm fitting for my liking. The quality of the fabric is top notch- it’s literally like butter. So soft. It’s not thin and hardly see through.
Shirt is ok. Very lightweight. Its form fitting. Mateeial is thin.

Love this shirt - super cute and reminds me of something you'd see in a 70s themed teen movie. I am usually an XL, which is what I ordered. It is tight but this was to be expected - the stretchiness keeps it comfortable. The material is also quite soft.
Really nice, soft shirt. Fits TTS. It isn’t see through. I just wish the sleeves were longer.
I’m not sure what type of material this is but I like how tight it fits. The color of the sleeves are like an olive green. The shirt itself is thin, but not too thin. The fabric is stretchy.
